title: [Basilica, Central Nave]
description: A huge obsidian throne rests in the center of the long rectangular hallway.  The floor beneath the throne is tiled in polished red marble streaked with ebony black lines.  Shadowed anterooms can be seen behind the columns that flank both sides of the hallway and arches open off each end.
paths: Obvious exits: north, east, south, west
